messages.content: Jesse Richardson works with Walter Lopez.
Walter Lopez is a colleague of Katherine Ward.
Katherine Ward works with Carol Harris.
Carol Harris is a colleague of Wayne Herrera.
Wayne Herrera works with Danielle Miller.
Danielle Miller is a colleague of Stephen Gonzalez.
Stephen Gonzalez works with Carol Ford.
Carol Ford is a colleague of Zachary Owens.
Zachary Owens works with Gabriel Ward.
Gabriel Ward is a colleague of Ryan Nguyen.

queries.question: Are Jesse Richardson and Ryan Nguyen related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
